sentences.sContent: People watched in horror as the plane crashed to the ground.
sentences.sCn: 人们惊恐地看着飞机坠落到地面上。

sentences.sContent: The thought of being left alone filled her with horror.
sentences.sCn: 想到被孤零零地留下，她就不寒而栗。

sentences.sContent: ...There’s part of this sickening horror of knowing you’re walking on the edge with this...
